input.name: __VIEWSTATEGENERATOR

span.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: inherit; font-size: 48px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: inline !important; white-space: pre-wrap; float: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);

span.span: As per the directive of Governor Greg Abbott, all Colorado County schools including Weimar ISD, Columbus ISD, and Rice CISD will remain closed until at least May 4, 2020. Please watch each district's website for further updates.

p.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;

span.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;
p.span: By staying apart for the time being, Rice CISD is working to ensure that we are limiting the spread of COVID-19 in our community. In service of this, we want to share a one-minute video that reminds us of the most important actions we can take as individuals to reduce risk for ourselves and others:

span.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

ul.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; list-style-type: disc;

li.span: Stay home as much as you can, especially if you have a cough, fever, or shortness of breath

span.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;
p.span: We encourage you to watch this video with your family. And be sure to share it with family and friends on social media and via email.

span.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;
p.span: Even though we are currently apart, we look forward to coming back together as a community soon.

p.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;

text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;

text-align: left; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none;

div.a:
Garwood Elementary School
2019 National Blue Ribbon School Profile

div.div: All school events are cancelled through May 4, 2020. This includes NHS Induction, Choir/Band Concerts, Art Shows and all FFA/Athletic events.Read more...
Free wifi is available at the following locations: In front of Sheridan Elementary School, in the ELPS front parking lot and in the Garwood Elementary School staff parking lot.Read more...

Beginning Monday, 3/30/20, to help limit the amount of interactions between all of us, Rice CISD will be passing out food for children on MONDAY ONLY. On this day, children ages 0-18 will receive 10 m...Read more...
Please click HERE for a letter from Rice CISD Superintendent, Mr. Bill Hefner IV.Read more...

Now that the Governor has extended the closure of public schools, plans are underway to continue the delivery of instruction to students regardless of how long this closure may last. In the next few d...Read more...
